sentences.english: National Day is coming, and we can have a seven day.
sentences.chinese: 國慶節來了，我有七天啲假期。

sentences.english: We celebrate our National Day every year.
sentences.chinese: 我們每年都要慶祝國慶節。

sentences.english: Ann: Yes. President Hu was in the same style car on the National Day.
sentences.chinese: 是的，胡主席在國慶那天乘坐了同一款式的車。

sentences.english: It is a(public) holiday in the PRC to celebrate its national day.
sentences.chinese: 這是中國的一個慶祝國慶節的法定假期。

sentences.english: Several new plays will be performed on National Day.
sentences.chinese: 國慶日將上演幾個新戲。

sentences.english: On the National Day holiday, thousands of people gather in the Square.
sentences.chinese: 國慶節的時候，大概有幾萬人堆集在廣場上。

sentences.english: To celebrate the National Day, reinforce parent-child relationship and foster community harmony.
sentences.chinese: 慶祝國慶，加強親子關係及促進社區和諧。

sentences.english: The National Day every ten every five, some will expand to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 逢五逢十的國慶，有的還要擴大慶祝。

sentences.english: The parterres will stay until the National Day on October 1.
sentences.chinese: 今年廣場花壇擺放將一直延續到國慶節後。

sentences.english: National Day is warmly celebrated on October 1 by the Chinese people of all nationalities every year.
sentences.chinese: 我國各族人民每年都要熱烈慶祝十月一日國慶節。

sentences.english: Singing and dancing, people celebrated National Day.
sentences.chinese: 人們載歌載舞慶祝國慶。

sentences.english: In the national day parade square foot teams, women militiamen last appearance.
sentences.chinese: 在國慶閱兵徒步方隊中，女民兵方隊最後一個亮相。

sentences.english: Our school will hold a big party this afternoon to celebrate National Day.
sentences.chinese: 學校今天下午舉辦一個大型晚會來慶祝國慶節。

sentences.english: He wrote an exciting eulogy for the celebrations on the Double Tenth Day.
sentences.chinese: 他爲國慶大典寫了激情澎湃的頌辭。

sentences.english: Fireworks burst over Ottawa's Rideau Canal in on honor of Canada's national birthday.
sentences.chinese: 煙花在渥太華運河上空綻放以慶祝加拿大國慶日。

sentences.english: Parade display of might 'not a threat'.
sentences.chinese: 國慶大閱兵不會對任何國家構成威脅。

definition: to celebrate the Chinese New Year
to go on a tour/to have an outing
Dragon Boat Festival (5th day of the 5th lunar month)
Xiamen or Amoy, subprovincial city in Fujian, abbr. 廈|厦[Xia4]
foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
to celebrate a festival/after the celebrations (i.e. once the festival is over)
Guangzhou subprovincial city and capital of Guangdong/Canton
